name: rdrp-scan-a-bioinformatic-resource-to-identify-and-annotate-divergent-rna-virus_2022
title: RdRp-scan: A Bioinformatic Resource to Identify and Annotate Divergent RNA Viruses in Metagenomic Sequence Data
bibtex: @article{Charon_2022, title={RdRp-scan: A bioinformatic resource to identify and annotate divergent RNA viruses in metagenomic sequence data}, volume={8}, ISSN={2057-1577}, url={http://dx.doi.org/10.1093/ve/veac082}, DOI={10.1093/ve/veac082}, number={2}, journal={Virus Evolution}, publisher={Oxford University Press (OUP)}, author={Charon, Justine and Buchmann, Jan P and Sadiq, Sabrina and Holmes, Edward C}, year={2022}, month=jul }
description: A bioinformatic resource, including a curated dataset and HMM profiles, for identifying and annotating diverse RNA viruses in metagenomic data.
